survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Electric Vehicle (EV) Charging Stations
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction with public EV charging stations, focusing on accessibility, ease of use, reliability, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations in a typical month?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Avoid overlapping ranges.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations in a typical month?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when selecting a public EV charging station? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Limit to 3 choices to prioritize responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes with max 3 selections)

script.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when selecting a public EV charging station? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the reliability of public EV charging stations you have used? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale. Label endpoints for clarity.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the reliability of public EV charging stations you have used? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)

questions.question_text: Have you ever encountered a charging station that was out of service or malfunctioning when you needed to use it?
questions.client_notes: Binary response. Route to Q5 if 'Yes'.

script.question_text: Have you ever encountered a charging station that was out of service or malfunctioning when you needed to use it?

questions.question_text: If you encountered a malfunctioning station, how was the issue resolved? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Waited for the station to become available
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question. Allow 'Other' as an open-text option if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes with optional open-text)

script.question_text: If you encountered a malfunctioning station, how was the issue resolved? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Waited for the station to become available

questions.question_text: What payment methods do you prefer for EV charging?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice with 'Other' as an open-text option.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with optional open-text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What payment methods do you prefer for EV charging?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the availability of EV charging stations in your area? (1 = Very Poor, 5 = Excellent)

script.question_text: How would you rate the availability of EV charging stations in your area? (1 = Very Poor, 5 = Excellent)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for public EV charging stations?
